# deltaDistanceAccuracy

**Instance Property**

The accuracy of the change in distance value.

## Declaration

```swift
var deltaDistanceAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy { get }
```

## Discussion

This property measures the accuracy of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMOdometerData/deltaDistance] property.

## Getting the location accuracy

- **speedAccuracy**: The accuracy of the speed value.
- **verticalAccuracy**: The validity of the altitude values and their estimated uncertainty, measured in meters.
